languages.text: "Ты должен дать мне шанс отыграться. Если попаду по бутылке на голове блюстителя — победа моя".

traits.locale_text: "Ты должен дать мне шанс отыграться. Если попаду по этому фрукту на голове блюстителя — победа моя".

languages.text: "You must give me a chance to redeem myself. If I hit the bottle on the enforcer's head, victory is mine."
languages.original_text: "Ты должен дать мне шанс отыграться. Если попаду по бутылке на голове блюстителя — победа моя".

traits.locale_text: "You must give me a chance to redeem myself. If I hit the bottle on the enforcer's head, victory is mine."
"You must give me a chance to redeem myself. If I hit the bottle on the enforcer's head, victory is mine."
"You must give me a chance to redeem myself. If I hit the bottle on the enforcer's head, victory is mine."
"You must give me a chance to redeem myself. If I hit the bottle on the enforcer's head, victory is mine."
"You must give me a chance to redeem myself. If I hit the bottle on the enforcer's head, victory is mine."

languages.text: 「名誉を挽回するチャンスをくれ。執行官の頭の上のボトルを命中させたら、{mf|俺|私}の勝ちだ！」
languages.original_text: "You must give me a chance to redeem myself. If I hit the bottle on the enforcer's head, victory is mine."

traits.locale_text: 「名誉を挽回するチャンスをくれ。執行官の頭の上のボトルを命中させたら、{mf|俺|私}の勝ちだ！」

languages.text: "Bana bir telafi fırsatı ver. İnfazcının başındaki şişeyi vurursam kazanırım."
languages.original_text: "You must give me a chance to redeem myself. If I hit the bottle on the enforcer's head, victory is mine."

traits.locale_text: "Bana bir telafi fırsatı ver. İnfazcının başındaki şişeyi vurursam kazanırım."

languages.text: «Debe darme una oportunidad de redimirme. Si acierto a la botella en la cabeza del guardia, la victoria es mía».
languages.original_text: "You must give me a chance to redeem myself. If I hit the bottle on the enforcer's head, victory is mine."

traits.locale_text: «Debe darme una oportunidad de redimirme. Si acierto a la botella en la cabeza del guardia, la victoria es mía».

languages.text: “你得给我个翻盘的机会。如果我能打到执法者头上的瓶子，那这次就算我赢了。”
languages.original_text: "You must give me a chance to redeem myself. If I hit the bottle on the enforcer's head, victory is mine."

traits.locale_text: “你得给我个翻盘的机会。如果我能打到执法者头上的瓶子，那这次就算我赢了。”

languages.text: « Vous me devez au moins une chance de me rattraper. Si je touche la bouteille sur la tête du prévôt, la victoire sera mienne. »
languages.original_text: "You must give me a chance to redeem myself. If I hit the bottle on the enforcer's head, victory is mine."

traits.locale_text: « Vous me devez au moins une chance de me rattraper. Si je touche la bouteille sur la tête du prévôt, la victoire sera mienne. »

languages.text: "Ihr müsst mir eine Chance geben, mich zu rehabilitieren. Wenn ich die Flasche auf dem Kopf des Enforcers treffe, habe ich gewonnen."
languages.original_text: "You must give me a chance to redeem myself. If I hit the bottle on the enforcer's head, victory is mine."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr müsst mir eine Chance geben, mich zu rehabilitieren. Wenn ich die Flasche auf dem Kopf des Enforcers treffe, habe ich gewonnen."
